definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: We cannot sit still, but we must fidget.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐臥不寧，煩躁不安。

sentences.english: But after that he became more restless and nervous.
sentences.chinese: 然而此後他變得坐臥不寧，惴惴不安。
